title: Rodgers still unsure on future, rips Jets for exit
description: Future Hall of Fame quarterback Aaron Rodgers said Thursday on "The Pat McAfee Show" that he is not ready to make a decision on his plans for the 2025 season and allowed that retirement could still be a possibility.
author: Brooke Pryor and Rich Cimini

title: FSU cancels athletic events after deadly shooting
description: Florida State canceled all home athletic events through Sunday after an on-campus shooting left two people dead and six others injured Thursday.
author: Andrea Adelson

title: Amorim 'inspired' by 1999 for United comeback
description: Ruben Amorim says he used Manchester United's famous 1999 Champions League final comeback win as "inspiration" for Thursday's Europa League triumph over Lyon.

title: 'You're going to have to put up with me for a bit longer'
description: Under-pressure Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou says reporters are "going to have to put up with me for a little bit longer" after his side reached the Europa League semi-finals.

title: Dobey picks up first Premier League nightly win in demolition of Bunting
description: Chris Dobey picked up his first Premier League Darts nightly win of 2025 with a 6-2 victory over Stephen Bunting in the final on Night 11 in Rotterdam.

title: 'Jaw dropping' - Your reaction to Man Utd's 'incredible' Lyon comeback
description: Where do you rank that win over Lyon for Manchester United? It is one of the most astonishing matches of all time.

title: Texas Longhorns kicker Bert Auburn enters transfer portal
description: After a rough postseason, Texas Longhorns kicker Bert Auburn has entered the transfer portal.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 10 - Ty Jerome (2022-23)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Jerome wore only jersey No. 10 and put up 6.9 points, 1.7 rebounds, and 3.0 assists per game.
